SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY productNo

SELECT P.productno, P.categorymapno, P.optionno, P.shopno, productname , productcontent, originprice, price, productorigin, enrolldate , selstartdate, selenddate, selstatus, CB.categoryName, CB.categoryNo FROM product P, categoryDetail CD, categoryBase CB WHERE 1=1 AND P.categoryMapNo = CD.categoryMapNo AND CD.categoryNo = CB.categoryNo AND P.productNo = #{productNo}
